Posts.Content: In October 2014 I found out that I had breast cancer and since then I have had a lumpectomy a mastectomy a reconstruction and a tummy tuck as they used the fat and skin from my tummy to do reconstruction I am now recovering and being well looked after by my loving husband who has been my rock although I am glad and relieved by all that has happened I sometimes just burst into tears and sob uncontrollably please could anyone tell me if this is normal. I am wondering if this is because everything has happened so fast and if I should go and talk to someone about this looking forward to hearing from anyone else who has or still is going through this Many thanks Sandy
Posts.Title: How should i be feeling??????

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response I really thought I was being unreasonable and ungrateful reacting this way as up to now all has gone so well I have had all my dressing removed and although scar on belly is big it's not unsightly and it will get better as time goes by same thing with the breast I have showered and rub e45 cream in regularly which is really helping I have got great support and help but I just can't stop myself from crying my husband has been fabulous but as he says he doesn't know what to say as he hasn't been through this and the emotions that goes with it thanks for your best wishes hoping all goes well for you to x
